sql-item.sql: select u.user_id,if(ifnull(u.`name`,'')='','会员',u.`name`) as name,w.openid From b2b_op_activity.op_gold_supplier_view a INNER JOIN b2b_user.uuc_user u on a.user_id=u.user_id left join (select supplier_id from b2b_company.uuc_supplier_basic where supplier_level =1) b on a.company_id=b.supplier_id inner JOIN ( SELECT wxa.userid,wxa.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser wxa INNER join m_yct.zq_user zqu on wxa.openid=zqu.openid WHERE zqu.appid=@appId ) w on u.user_id=w.userid where date(a.last_visit_time)=date(date_add(now(),interval -1 DAY)) and u.user_biz_type=1 and b.supplier_id is null
